name: CookieClicker World Feeder Edition
description:
My submission for the 2019 LowRezJam

!NOT COMPLETE!

You are the CEO of a newly formed world wide organization whose goal is to feed the entire world after a terrible cataclysm makes everyone really hungry. You start with clicking cookies and eventually upgrade to some great tasting food.

Most game mechanics are already implemented in this first version. All I have left to do is to cram in as much upgrades as I can! I'd love to hear what you think of the game (especially the balancing of upgrade costs).

All assets were made by me except the font which is Kenny's.
